name: Dragonborne DX
storyline: Play as Kris in his quest to find his father and save the region of Argon from certain destruction as the dragons start to mysteriously awaken from their slumber.​
summary:
Play as Kris in his quest to find his father and save the region of Argon from certain destruction as the dragons start to mysteriously awaken from their slumber.​

Get ready to travel through the land of Argon as you've never seen it before...
Dragonborne DX is a remake of the original indie/homebrew title Dragonborne for the Game Boy.

​Experience the legendary story of Dragonborne with enhanced graphics and gameplay mechanics, a remastered soundtrack, and bonus content.
